name: omit count reset
punch begin
punch end
merge to output
validate env variable
set args
check init
query changed
func:
const begin_time = msg.args.utilization_begin_time
const end_time = msg.args.utilization_end_time

const device_id = env.get("device_id")
const channel_id = env.get("channel_id")

msg.query = `
    SELECT "${channel_id}"
    FROM "${device_id}"
    WHERE time >= '${begin_time.toISOString()}'
    AND time < '${end_time.toISOString()}'
`

node.log(msg.query)

return msg;

name: save changed_list
func:
msg.args.changed_list = msg.payload

return msg;

name: query previous state
func:
const begin_time = msg.args.utilization_begin_time

const device_id = env.get("device_id")
const channel_id = env.get("channel_id")

msg.query = `
    SELECT "${channel_id}"
    FROM "${device_id}"
    WHERE time < '${begin_time.toISOString()}'
    ORDER BY time DESC
    LIMIT 1
`

node.log(msg.query)

return msg;
